DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety tolerability estimate MTD and/or recommend dose expansion .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study LEE011 Asian Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , open label , dose finding , phase I study oral single agent LEE011 , administer daily .
DOC.criteria: Patient histologically confirm diagnosis solid tumor ECOG PS < 2 Good organ function screen visit A sufficient interval mast elapse last dose prior anticancer therapy Impairment GI function Patients concurrent severe and/or uncontrolled concurrent medical condition Known diagnosis HIV active viral hepatitis Pregnant nursing ( lactate ) woman
